Translations.Text: Vony znayshly tse nezvychayne shcho warner z chysla yim prybuly yim! disbelievers skazalo, "Tse ye diysno nezvychayne
Pislya my vmyrayemo ta stayemo pylom; tse nemozhlyve
My znayemo tsilkom budʹ khto z nykh khto pryyizhdzhaye spozhytyy zemleyu; my mayemo tochnyy zapys
Vony vidkhylyly pravdu koly yomu prybuly yim; vony nadzvychayno zmishuyutʹsya
vony ne podyvylysya na nebo nad nymy, ta yak my skonstruyuvaly tse ta prykrasyly tse, bez vady
Ta my utvoryly zemlyu, ta rozkynenu po tse hory, ta vyrosly u tse vsi riznovydy krasyvykh zavodiv
Tse ye enlightenment, ta reminder dlya kozhnoho nabizhnyy worshiper
Ta my poslaly z neba blahoslovenna voda, shchob vyrosty z tse park ta zerna buty zibrani urozhay
Vysoki palʹmy daty, z clustered plid
Umovy dlya lyudey. Ta my ozhyvayemo z tse mertvi zemli; vy analohichno resurrected
Disbelieving pered tym, yak yim yavlyaly soboyu lyudey Noah, dwellers Russ, ta Thamoud
Ta dwellers lisiv, ta lyudey Tubba. Usi disbelieved kur'yery ta, otzhe, Miy retribution befell yim
my nadto burdened pershym stvorennyam? Tse chomu vony sumniv resurrection
